comment.author: 29029178@N03
comment._content: The verandah is still there but there is an addition on the back, however the ground floor looks as if there has been quite a bit of renovation. Its good to see the original & how the structure looks now. Thanks brett.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Hi Brettm8 and dunedoo, thanks for the comment and the recent photo of the hotel. Although it has had some comestic changes I'm sure the beer is just as good as it was in 1926!
